languages.text: "Я знаю, что желала отомстить ему, но... мне уже его не хватает".

traits.locale_text: "Я знаю, что желала отомстить ему, но... мне уже его не хватает".

languages.text: "I know I sought vengeance against him, but... I feel his absence already."
languages.original_text: "Я знаю, что желала отомстить ему, но... мне уже его не хватает".

traits.locale_text: "I know I sought vengeance against him but... I miss him already."
"I know I sought vengeance against him but... I miss him already."
"I know I sought vengeance against him but... I feel his absence already."
"I know I sought vengeance against him but... I feel his absence already."
"I know I sought vengeance against him, but... I feel his absence already."
"I know I sought vengeance against him, but... I feel his absence already."

languages.text: « Je sais que j'ai cherché à me venger de lui, mais... son absence me pèse déjà. »
languages.original_text: "I know I sought vengeance against him, but... I feel his absence already."

traits.locale_text: « Je sais que j'ai cherché à me venger de lui, mais... son absence me pèse déjà. »

languages.text: «Sé que quería vengarme de él, pero... ya siento su ausencia».
languages.original_text: "I know I sought vengeance against him, but... I feel his absence already."

traits.locale_text: «Sé que quería vengarme de él, pero... ya siento su ausencia».

languages.text: 「確かに彼に復讐しようとしていました。でも…胸にぽっかり穴が空いた気分です」
languages.original_text: "I know I sought vengeance against him, but... I feel his absence already."

traits.locale_text: 「確かに彼に復讐しようとしていました。でも…胸にぽっかり穴が空いた気分です」

languages.text: “我知道我渴望向他复仇，可……我已经感觉到失去了他是什么滋味。”
languages.original_text: "I know I sought vengeance against him, but... I feel his absence already."

traits.locale_text: “我知道我渴望向他复仇，可……我已经感觉到失去了他是什么滋味。”

languages.text: "Ich weiß, ich wollte mich an ihm rächen, doch ... Ich spüre seine Abwesenheit bereits."
languages.original_text: "I know I sought vengeance against him, but... I feel his absence already."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, ich wollte mich an ihm rächen, doch ... Ich spüre seine Abwesenheit bereits."

languages.text: "Ondan intikam almak istediğimin farkındayım ama... Yokluğunu şimdiden hissediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I know I sought vengeance against him, but... I feel his absence already."
